**Section 20: Dr. Danielle Sass** is an Assistant Professor of Instruction for the Department of Statistics and Data Science at Northwestern University. She received her Ph.D in Statistics from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. Her passion and focus is curriculum and content development for undergraduate students. Office hours can be made by appointment by emailing danielle.sass\@northwestern.edu
